title: Logged in to a Reward today but don't know what it was?
body:
Anyone know what reward we were given today (27th)? I logged in to a reward from riot but the new client showed me the alert through the little bell icon. I clicked and looked at it, upon saying 'ok cool thanks' pretty much by closing the window i expected another popup to tell me what the reward was but nothing happened. I have no idea what it was.

Unless riot is giving out rewards for people who successfully report people they reprimand it must have been a global reward. Anyone?

replies.body:
Hey there,

>Gifting notifications have been enabled in the updated client. However, this is the first time we turned on this feature and you may see notifications for the gifts you have received in the past. This will only happen on your first login.
same here, got 3 pop-up rewards as i logged in, dunno what it is or where I can find the rewards?
